Now I really can't wait :'(

item.title: New Screenshots in Mark Foreman's portfolio ( WARNING: SPOILERS )
item.dc:creator: geekofalltrades
item.description:
thomas_c:

Free content on the Xbox360? MS can’t have that. Everything that gets released on XBLA, MS wants some piece of the cake.

And if there is no cake, they still want a fucking piece.

Read full topic

item.source: New Screenshots in Mark Foreman's portfolio ( WARNING: SPOILERS )

item.title: New Screenshots in Mark Foreman's portfolio ( WARNING: SPOILERS )
item.dc:creator: thomas_c
item.description:
DEATH eVADER:

So I was thinking, with the Portal 2 DLC nearing arrival, I was wondering whether you guys made a deal with valve them to have this project piggy backed or twinned as to deliver it through PS3 and Xbox360 as free content.

Free content on the Xbox360? MS can’t have that. Everything that gets released on XBLA, MS wants some piece of the cake.

Read full topic

item.title: New Screenshots in Mark Foreman's portfolio ( WARNING: SPOILERS )
item.dc:creator: Kaweebo
item.description:
They haven’t made any deals with Valve, they only had some small conversations via email. If that were to ever happen (which I doubt) it would be after the mods release. However, for some reason, JamesKane is looking into making the mod compatible with Windows Xbox 360 controllers.

Read full topic

item.title: New Screenshots in Mark Foreman's portfolio ( WARNING: SPOILERS )
item.dc:creator: Vincent_Vega
item.description:
Tuskin38:

Do I see Projected Textures/Dynamic shadows in the opening area to Anomalous Materials ?

Yes you do, they likely went and applied the fixes seen on the valve development wiki.
They say the’re not changing the engine, but all in all they have
So You can expect new things
I always say, it is what it is!
and it is DAMN IMPRESSIVE

Read full topic
